TC_CP_03_User_is_able_to_change_password.TestPurpose: User is able to change password by providing valid information

TC_CP_04_05_User_is_unable_to_Change_Pas.TestPurpose: User is unable to Change Password by leaving current password field empty
TC_CP_04_05_User_is_unable_to_Change_Pas.ErrorMessage: Password change failed. Please correct the errors and try again.

TC_CP_04_05_User_is_unable_to_Change_Pas.TestPurpose: User is able to change password by providing wrong password
TC_CP_04_05_User_is_unable_to_Change_Pas.ErrorMessage: An error occurred when attempting to change the password. Maybe your current password is incorrect.

TC_CP_06_08_Unable_to_change_password_by.TestPurpose: User is unable to Change Password by leaving new password or confirm password field empty
TC_CP_06_08_Unable_to_change_password_by.ErrorMessage: Password change failed. Please correct the errors and try again.

TC_CP_09_Unable_to_change_password_when_.TestPurpose: Unable to change password when new password and confirm password field are not match
TC_CP_09_Unable_to_change_password_when_.ErrorMessage: Password change failed. Please correct the errors and try again.
TC_CP_09_Unable_to_change_password_when_.ConfirmPasswordErrorMessage: The password confirmation does not match the new password.
